mapper.select: SELECT TOTAL_AR_RATE, year FROM gu_crime WHERE gu_crime.year IN (2004, 2007, 2010, 2013, 2016, 2019, 2022) AND gu_crime.local IN ( SELECT gu_name.local FROM gu_name WHERE guname= #{guNameValue})

SELECT gu_name.guname, gu_env.population, gu_secugrade.y2022 FROM gu_name JOIN gu_env ON gu_name.local = gu_env.local JOIN gu_secugrade ON gu_name.local = gu_secugrade.local WHERE gu_name.guname = #{guNameValue} and gu_env.year='2022'

SELECT trunc(AVG(cctv)) as avg_cctv, trunc(AVG(policestation))as avg_policestation, trunc(AVG(lights))as avg_lights, MAX(CASE WHEN guname = #{guNameValue} THEN cctv END)as cctv, MAX(CASE WHEN guname = #{guNameValue} THEN policestation END) as policestation, MAX(CASE WHEN guname = #{guNameValue} THEN lights END) as lights FROM gu_secufacil JOIN gu_name ON gu_secufacil.local = gu_name.local WHERE year = 2022
SELECT rank FROM ( SELECT local, ${year} AS year, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ${year} DESC) AS rank FROM perceivedsafety ) WHERE local IN ( SELECT local FROM gu_name WHERE guname = #{guNameValue} )
